item.description:
CNHT will hold its annual Taxpayer Reunion Picnic in Hillsborough on Saturday July 7, 2012 from around 12:00 Noon to 2:00 PM at the Hillsborough American Legion #59 in Hillsborough NH. This year's theme will be VOTER FRAUD. The usual picnic fare will be offered, all you can eat, for $15. Kids 12 and under eat free.

All declared candidates for Governor, US Congress, and the NH Legislature and other State Offices are invited to speak and encouraged to attend along with taxpayers from all over the state. Straw polls for CDs 1 and 2 and Governor will be held.

All organizations and candidates are invited to have a display table in the hall. For more info on tabling requirements, SPEAKING OPPORTUNITIES, signing the PLEDGE, or any other questions, please contact jane@cnht.org

There will be two lines at the door - one for pre-paid (internet) tickets and another for "at the door". We encourage you to pre-pay your tickets online, print out your receipt and present for faster processing. Volunteers are needed to help move furniture, cook, and take tickets.

BUY TICKETS ONLINE: http://www.cnht.org/picnic2012.php
item.name: CNHT ANNUAL TAXPAYER PICNIC w/ straw polls
